Delivering $20 worth of groceries. A waste of time. Substituting was allowed but they didn’t do that for most items. Just cancelled items. Similar was available in store and they couldn’t be bothered substituting. Didn’t even bother to substitute for milk or prawns, which are in stock. I have never seen a supermarket without milk!I can go on line now and order major items cancelled and it is in stock (my delivery is not yet arrived).Ordinary effort and my on line chat was no better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/woolworths.com.au/63a1547d2338b6d417a13816","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/woolworths.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"J G","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63a1546cf510a20012bf1ed9/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-20T08:21:49.000Z","headline":"Very few registers open","reviewBody":"Very few registers open. So much thievery happens with self serve, counter productive. It is a bit discriminatory to expect older people to use self service. Lucky  I Tracked the order so knew where the Delivery Driver had  Just left my groceries on someone else’s doorstep UNATTENDED. The drivers are friendly and the orders are right 99% of the time. Only sometimes will they miss an item but their robot \"Olive\" refunds any mistakes. Fruit and vegetables is a bit of a gamble but because I buy most of my fruit and veg from the markets, that hasn't been a problem. I use woolies for frozen, pantry, canned goods and cleaning products.I bought the yearly subscription last year and it recently came up for renewal and I gladly paid again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"5"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/woolworths.com.au/6382c4fdb84cc27618f81b29","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/woolworths.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"susan willson","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6382c15ec9a8d70012d2b107/"},"datePublished":"2022-11-27T04:01:33.000Z","headline":"Hallett Cove rubbish revamp","reviewBody":"The Hallett Cove store has had a horrible revamp, the worst I have ever seen. It not only looks ugly, customers were totally confused about where to go. Different checkout sections all boxed in, massive new self-serve checkout area and no quick-serve checkout for 15 items or fewer. As I shop daily, the quick-serve till is a must for me. Why has this disappeared? TOO MANY PAPER BAGS USED SOME HAD ONLY 2 ITEMS IN EACH AND I HAD TO PAY FOR THEM.SO MUCH FOR SAVING THE ENVIRONMENT AND NOT CUTTING DOWN TREES, WHAT A JOKE, JUST ANOTHER  MONEY MAKING EXERCISE ON BEHALF OF WOOLWORTHS.ABNSOLUTE TOKENISM.STAFF ARE UNTRAINED AND ILL - INFORMED.ORDER NOT READY AT STATED TIME, HAD TO HANG AROUND WHILE THEY FILLED ORDER INCORRECTLY.NO LONGER GIVE PAER LIST WITH ORDER.ON THE WHOLE ABSOLUTLY APPALLING ON IN EVERY ASPECT OF THEIR SERVICE.I WILL BE SHOPPING AT COLES FROM NOW ON.FROM A DISCUSTED CUSTOMER.GILLIAN","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/woolworths.com.au/6378cc11b84cc27618f0a87d","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/woolworths.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ashley Tremain","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/6378cc02039489001324d63b/"},"datePublished":"2022-11-19T14:29:05.000Z","headline":"With a company that makes billions…","reviewBody":"With a company that makes billions every year you would think that you could Mabey break even once so that we can survive. Food prices are crazy and I can't keep going like this!!! Do the right thing because what use is a dollar when no one can eat. The drivers are friendly and the orders are right 99% of the time. Only sometimes will they miss an item but their robot \"Olive\" refunds any mistakes. Fruit and vegetables is a bit of a gamble but because I buy most of my fruit and veg from the markets, that hasn't been a problem. Why has this disappeared? Lucky  I Tracked the order so knew where the Delivery Driver had  Just left my groceries on someone else’s doorstep UNATTENDED. Obviously it is!! Even so there were strict instructions which sated “DO NOT LEAVE ORDER UNATTENDED” and “RING DOORBELL”.  I will NOT be using Third Party Option in Future.  Lucky  I Tracked the order so knew where the Delivery Driver had  Just left my groceries on someone else’s doorstep UNATTENDED. Similar was available in store and they couldn’t be bothered substituting. Didn’t even bother to substitute for milk or prawns, which are in stock. I have never seen a supermarket without milk!I can go on line now and order major items cancelled and it is in stock (my delivery is not yet arrived).Ordinary effort and my on line chat was no better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/woolworths.com.au/63a1547d2338b6d417a13816","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/woolworths.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"J G","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63a1546cf510a20012bf1ed9/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-20T08:21:49.000Z","headline":"Very few registers open","reviewBody":"Very few registers open. Similar was available in store and they couldn’t be bothered substituting. Didn’t even bother to substitute for milk or prawns, which are in stock. The drivers are friendly and the orders are right 99% of the time. Only sometimes will they miss an item but their robot \"Olive\" refunds any mistakes. Fruit and vegetables is a bit of a gamble but because I buy most of my fruit and veg from the markets, that hasn't been a problem. Why has this disappeared? Lucky  I Tracked the order so knew where the Delivery Driver had  Just left my groceries on someone else’s doorstep UNATTENDED. Obviously it is!! Even so there were strict instructions which sated “DO NOT LEAVE ORDER UNATTENDED” and “RING DOORBELL”.  I will NOT be using Third Party Option in Future.  Lucky  I Tracked the order so knew where the Delivery Driver had  Just left my groceries on someone else’s doorstep UNATTENDED. Similar was available in store and they couldn’t be bothered substituting. Didn’t even bother to substitute for milk or prawns, which are in stock. I have never seen a supermarket without milk!I can go on line now and order major items cancelled and it is in stock (my delivery is not yet arrived).Ordinary effort and my on line chat was no better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","bestRating":"5","worstRating":"1","ratingValue":"1"},"publisher":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/1"},"inLanguage":"en"},{"@type":"Review","@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Review/woolworths.com.au/63a1547d2338b6d417a13816","itemReviewed":{"@id":"https://www.trustpilot.com/#/schema/Organization/woolworths.com.au"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"J G","url":"https://au.trustpilot.com/users/63a1546cf510a20012bf1ed9/"},"datePublished":"2022-12-20T08:21:49.000Z","headline":"Very few registers open","reviewBody":"Very few registers open. Similar was available in store and they couldn’t be bothered substituting. Didn’t even bother to substitute for milk or prawns, which are in stock.
